amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 118-142 to prohibit any form of support or direct involvement by federal agencies in research that is conducted by the Chinese government, the Chinese Communist Party, or any of their affiliated agents, intstruments, or entities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luna amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mrs. Luna.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luna amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
